poster: P A C C S U
title: What I would like ARAM to be
body:
This is what I want ARAM to be: (only my opinion)

1. Unlock all the champions for everyone.
2. Remove the ability to reroll the champions.
3. People would be obliged to play the champion they are assigned to, even when they decide to dodge. This means, that person has to play an ARAM game with a particular champion, to get the ability to get another champion in the next game (people still can swap champions between each other in champion select). 

As a hardcore ARAM player, I like the idea of it being random but I would love the idea of it being TRULY{{champion:44}}  ALL RANDOM -experience.
